Question
========

You buy 10 lottery tickets for €1 each. With each lottery ticket you have a chance of 0.06 to win €10. If you take into account the cost of the lottery tickets, how likely is it that you will win €10 or more?

Answerlist
----------

* 0,06
* 0,10
* 0,12
* 0,94

Solution
========

Answerlist
----------

* 0.06: Incorrect
* 0.10: Incorrect
* 0.12: Correct
* 0.94: Incorrect
